unnormalised: Entertainment News: OMG! Did Ranbir just confirm Alia’s pregnancy *again*?
normalised: Entertainment News: O M G! Did Ranbir just confirm Alia’s pregnancy asterisk again asterisk?

unnormalised: Bollywood’s rumour mill is churning faster than a lassi maker at a Delhi wedding! Paparazzi pics from last night, 10 PM sharp, show Ranbir Kapoor holding Alia Bhatt's hand outside Lilavati Hospital. Is baby Kapoor junior arriving sooner than expected?
normalised: Bollywood’s rumour mill is churning faster than a lassi maker at a Delhi wedding! Paparazzi pics from last night, ten P M sharp, show Ranbir Kapoor holding Alia Bhatt's hand outside Lilavati Hospital. Is baby Kapoor junior arriving sooner than expected?

unnormalised: Remember all the speculation after Alia wore that flowy anarkali at the Ambani party on 20/03/2024? Well, a close source – let’s call her “Deepika’s neighbour’s dog walker” – claims that Alia's been prepping for the big day since 15/06/2024, following a strict diet of ghar ka khana and prenatal yoga at Bandra’s famous "Yoga with Ira" studio.
normalised: Remember all the speculation after Alia wore that flowy anarkali at the Ambani party on twentieth March two thousand and twenty four? Well, a close source – let’s call her “Deepika’s neighbour’s dog walker” – claims that Alia's been prepping for the big day since fifteenth June two thousand and twenty four, following a strict diet of ghar ka khana and prenatal yoga at Bandra’s famous "Yoga with Ira" studio.

unnormalised: Ranbir, tight-lipped as always, only smiled when reporters cornered him this morning. He did, however, subtly touch his stomach after being asked, “Baba, kab hai khushkhabri?”. Is this his way of telling us the good news is imminent? Stay tuned for more updates on this breaking story! We’ll keep you posted!
